thread.title: Marist tops Campbell, 13-10, on Maccarone’s 28-yard FG
thread.title_full: Marist tops Campbell, 13-10, on Maccarone’s 28-yard FG

author: wtopstaff
title: Marist tops Campbell, 13-10, on Maccarone’s 28-yard FG
text:
By The Associated Press October 10, 2015 9:09 pm 
BUIES CREEK, N.C. (AP) — Michael White threw for 223 yards and Mike Maccarone kicked a 28-yard field goal midway through the fourth quarter to earn Marist a 13-10 Pioneer League win over Campbell Saturday. 
Maccarone opened the scoring with the first of his two 28-yard field goals, but the Camels scored at the end of the first quarter on a 4-yard run by Kameron Bryant that made it 7-3. 
Marist (2-4, 1-2) took the lead to start the second half, picking off a Bryant pass and returning it to midfield and needed just three plays to get into the end zone, with Marcellus Calhoun punching in from the 1 for the score to make it 10-7. 
Campbell’s Mitchell Brown’s 37-yard field goal tied the game at 10-10 at the start of the fourth quarter. 
Bryant was 17 of 29 for 157 yards to lead Campbell (3-3, 1-2), but was intercepted three times. Topics:
